INSTRUCTIONS.One: First off you -must- make the xml document -before- setting Moving behaviour on the room.
INSTRUCTIONS.Two: Second the rooms in the STOPS section -must- exist -before- you make the XML document.
INSTRUCTIONS.Three: The moving behaviour parameters are as such: min=3 max=3 chance=100;[XML section];[time at stops];[time between stops] [XML section] is the group the class will parse, in the second example its SUBWAY [time at stops] is the ticks the room waits at each stop (ie. 4 sec per tick)
INSTRUCTIONS.Four: Look at the Examples below to see what to fill in each field. it might be easier to view the examples in a XML viewer such as Internet Explorer.
INSTRUCTIONS.Five: You can inclue the following to be translated on the fly. $disproom -when the door is opened: (room is stopped) this is the room name the door leads to. -when the door is closed: (room is moving to next stop) this is the room that is the next stop. $inopendir -this is the direction the door opens from the inside. $outopendir -this is the direction the door opens from the outside. $traveldir -this is the current direction the room is traveling
INSTRUCTIONS.Six: Remember to remove all exits to and from your moving room before adding the MovingRoom behavior

EXAMPLE.ROOMPRINTNAME: [very short name of the mover for the MoverMap, example. 'the crowded subway car' = 'subway car']
EXAMPLE.LINEPRINTNAME: [the name of this movers line, examples 'Bus #1','flight 104','The soft desert caravan']
EXAMPLE.DISPLOC: [either 'true' or 'false', true means the movermap will show the current place of the mover and its direction]

STOPS.STOP1: [stop id of first room the mover will stop at]
STOPS.STOP2: [stop id of second room the mover will stop at]
STOPS.STOP3: [stop id of third room the mover will stop at]
STOPS.STOP4: [stop id of fourth room the mover will stop at]

NORMALDIRECTION.TRAVELDIRECTION: [direction the mover is going while traveling from STOP1 to STOPx]
NORMALDIRECTION.DOORSDIRECTION: [direction the door opens from inside the mover to the stop while traveling from STOP1 to STOPx]

INSIDE.ARRIVALINFO: [what will be echoed in the moving room when the mover arrives and it is traveling from STOP1 to STOPx]
INSIDE.DEPARTINFO: [what will be echoed in the moving room when the mover departs and it is traveling from STOP1 to STOPx]

OUTSIDE.ARRIVALINFO: [what will be echoed in the room the mover arrives at when the mover arrives at it and it is traveling from STOP1 to STOPx]
OUTSIDE.DEPARTINFO: [what will be echoed in the room the mover departs from when the mover departs at it and it is traveling from STOP1 to STOPx]

REVERSEDIRECTION.TRAVELDIRECTION: [direction the mover is going while traveling from STOPx to STOP1]
REVERSEDIRECTION.DOORSDIRECTION: [direction the door opens from inside the mover to the stop while traveling from STOPx to STOP1]

INSIDE.ARRIVALINFO: [what will be echoed in the moving room when the mover arrives and it is traveling from STOPx to STOP1]
INSIDE.DEPARTINFO: [what will be echoed in the moving room when the mover departs and it is traveling from STOPx to STOP1]

OUTSIDE.ARRIVALINFO: [what will be echoed in the room the mover arrives at when the mover arrives at it and it is traveling from STOPx to STOP1]
OUTSIDE.DEPARTINFO: [what will be echoed in the room the mover departs from when the mover departs at it and it is traveling from STOPx to STOP1]

INSIDE.DOOROPENED: [the text appended to the description of the mover while it is at a stop and it is traveling from STOP1 to STOPx]
INSIDE.DOORCLOSED: [the text appended to the description of the mover while it is not at a stop (ie. moving) and traveling from STOP1 to STOPx]

OUTSIDE.DOOROPENED: [The text appended to the description of the stop while the mover is stoped there and it is traveling from STOP1 to STOPx]
OUTSIDE.DOORCLOSED: [the text appended to the description of the stop while the mover is not stopped there and it is traveling from STOP1 to STOPx]

INSIDE.DOOROPENED: [the text appended to the description of the mover while it is at a stop and it is traveling from STOPx to STOP1]
INSIDE.DOORCLOSED: [the text appended to the description of the mover while it is not at a stop (ie. moving) and traveling from STOPx to STOP1]

OUTSIDE.DOOROPENED: [The text appended to the description of the stop while the mover is stoped there and it is traveling from STOPx to STOP1]
OUTSIDE.DOORCLOSED: [the text appended to the description of the stop while the mover is not stopped there and it is traveling from STOPx to STOP1]

INSIDE.ARRIVALINFO: The subway car stops at $disproom and the doors to the $inopendir swish opened.
INSIDE.DEPARTINFO: The subway car doors swish closed and the train departs to the $traveldir.\nA crackly voice coming through the small speakers on the car roof says,\n 'Next Stop $disproom.'

OUTSIDE.ARRIVALINFO: A $traveldirbound subway car arrives on the platform to the $outopendir and the doors swish opened.
OUTSIDE.DEPARTINFO: The subway cars doors swish closed\nThe subway car departs $traveldir down the tunnel.

INSIDE.ARRIVALINFO: The subway car stops at $disproom and the doors to the $inopendir swish opened.
INSIDE.DEPARTINFO: The subway car doors swish closed and the train departs to the $traveldir.\nA crackly voice coming through the small speakers on the car roof says,\n 'Next Stop $disproom.'

OUTSIDE.ARRIVALINFO: An $traveldirbound subway car arrives on the platform to the $outopendir and the doors swish opened.
OUTSIDE.DEPARTINFO: The subway cars doors swish closed\nThe subway car departs $traveldir down the tunnel.

INSIDE.DOOROPENED: A metalic sliding door to the $inopendir leads to the platform of $disproom.
INSIDE.DOORCLOSED: Both metalic sliding doors are closed. The car is traveling $traveldir.

OUTSIDE.DOOROPENED: A $traveldirbound subway car is waiting at the platform to the $outopendir.
OUTSIDE.DOORCLOSED: The tracks are empty of subway cars.

INSIDE.DOOROPENED: A metalic sliding door to the $inopendir leads to the platform of $disproom.
INSIDE.DOORCLOSED: Both metalic sliding doors are closed. The car is traveling $traveldir.

OUTSIDE.DOOROPENED: A $traveldirbound subway car is waiting at the platform to the $outopendir.
OUTSIDE.DOORCLOSED: The tracks are empty of subway cars.

INSIDE.ARRIVALINFO: The bus comes to a stop, doors to the $inopendir open.\nThe driver yells:\n '$disproom'
INSIDE.DEPARTINFO: The drive closes the door and the bus lurches foreward.

OUTSIDE.ARRIVALINFO: The $traveldirbound Bus number 1 arrives.\nThe doors swing opened.
OUTSIDE.DEPARTINFO: The bus doors swing closed.\nThe bus speeds off $traveldir

INSIDE.ARRIVALINFO: The bus comes to a stop, doors to the $inopendir open.\nThe driver yells:\n '$disproom'
INSIDE.DEPARTINFO: The drive closes the door and the bus lurches foreward.

OUTSIDE.ARRIVALINFO: The $traveldirbound Bus number 1 arrives.\nThe doors swing opened.
OUTSIDE.DEPARTINFO: The bus doors swing closed.\nThe bus speeds off $traveldir

INSIDE.DOORCLOSED: The bus is traveling along to the $traveldir

OUTSIDE.DOOROPENED: A bus is here loading passengers.

INSIDE.DOORCLOSED: The bus is traveling along to the $traveldir

OUTSIDE.DOOROPENED: A bus is here loading passengers.
